org.apache.drill.exec.util

Class StoragePluginTestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.util.StoragePluginTestUtils

  • public class StoragePluginTestUtils
extends Object
    This class contains utility methods to speed up tests. Some of the production code currently calls this method when the production code is executed as part of the test runs. That's the reason why this code has to be in production module.

                                        StoragePluginRegistry pluginRegistry,
                                        File tmpDirPath,
                                        String... schemas)
                                 throws ExecutionSetupException
        Update the workspace locations for a plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The plugin to update.
        pluginRegistry - A plugin registry.
        tmpDirPath - The directory to use.
